nodes.text: RMS droids were a type of droid that had cylindrical bodies with two legs at the bottom and a domed top. A tube ran from the top of the droid down one side of its body, and an antenna protruded from the top of the droid on the same side as the tube. RMS droids could have gray plating with a single band of red near the top of the droids body.

In 32 BBY, an RMS droid was stood next to the door in the Toydarian Watto's shop in the town of Mos Espa on the planet Tatooine when the Jedi Qui-Gon Jinn, Queen Padmé Amidala, the Gungan Jar Jar Binks and the astromech droid R2-D2 entered.

An RMS droid first appeared in the 1999 prequel trilogy film, Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace. The droid was first identified in "Every Droid in Star Wars" a video released in 2019 by the Star Wars Kids YouTube channel.
